item.title: Version 1.2.15
item.description:
What's New

Release v1.2.15: Enhanced User Dictionary Management

Features:

  • Add Import/Export functionality for User Dictionary
  • Implement file-based import/export with .txt format
  • Add proper error handling and user feedback for import/export operations
  • Enhance WindowTitleRulesView with better UI controls
  • Improve keyboard event handling logic

Improvements:

  • Add UniformTypeIdentifiers support for file operations
  • Implement UserDictionaryDocument for file export
  • Better validation for imported dictionary words
  • Enhanced user experience with success/error alerts
  • Improved code organization in AdvancedSection

Bug Fixes:

  • Fix keyboard event handler edge cases
  • Improve IMController composing text handling
  • Better engine state management
